About the Company: Signet Industries Ltd is engaged in the manufacture, trade, and export of poly products in India. The company distributes HDPE, LDPE, PVC, PP, and PET resins.They are also involved in the manufacture of various plastic products; and the distribution of chemical products, including food chemicals, phosphate, and paints. In addition, they operate wind turbine power unit; and offers wax products and spices..The company also engagged in the business of Wind Mill, Merchant Trading.
